model

Class OpenAndSave

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.OpenAndSave

  • public class OpenAndSave
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will be used to save, open, print, make new etc...
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Gurvan LORANS et Samuel LE BERRE

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpenAndSave(MenuBarListener menuBar)
      This is the constructor, it initialize the attribute with the menuBar in parameter
      OpenAndSave(ToolBarListener toolBar)
      This is the constructor, it initialize the attribute with the toolBar in parameter

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void changeTitleTab(java.lang.String title)
      This procedure will be used to change the name of the tab (when we save a tab in another path for example)
      void makeTextPaneTab(java.lang.String title)
      This method will make a new tab in the JTabbedPane with JTextPane for Component
      void openFileInTab()
      This procedure will be used to make new Tabs from file
      void print()
      This method will call the print method in the JTextPane It will check if the tab is a printable tab and it will change the ActionBar if the print has been made
      void save(java.lang.String path)
      This method will save the content of a tab, it will only save it in the currentPath set in the JScrollPaneToSave
      java.lang.String saveAs()
      This method will open a JFileChooser the save the JScrollPaneToSave, it will ask if the user wants to overwrite if the file already exists if the currentPath of a JScrollPaneToSave is null the method will be called

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • openFileInTab

        public void openFileInTab()
        This procedure will be used to make new Tabs from file

      • makeTextPaneTab

        public void makeTextPaneTab(java.lang.String title)
        This method will make a new tab in the JTabbedPane with JTextPane for Component
        Parameters:
        title - the name for the Tab

      • changeTitleTab

        public void changeTitleTab(java.lang.String title)
        This procedure will be used to change the name of the tab (when we save a tab in another path for example)
        Parameters:
        title - the title to put

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.String path)
        This method will save the content of a tab, it will only save it in the currentPath set in the JScrollPaneToSave
        Parameters:
        path -

      • saveAs

        public java.lang.String saveAs()
        This method will open a JFileChooser the save the JScrollPaneToSave, it will ask if the user wants to overwrite if the file already exists if the currentPath of a JScrollPaneToSave is null the method will be called
        Returns:
        the new SavePath that will be put in the JScrollPaneToSave

      • print

        public void print()
        This method will call the print method in the JTextPane It will check if the tab is a printable tab and it will change the ActionBar if the print has been made
